Author: Rob Sewell
Summary: This runbook creates a number of VMs (default 2) in an availablility group. It will create and attach extra data disks, attach to domain and virtual network if required.    Can be used with New-CloudService and New-StorageAccount to automate environment creation    Requir
Title: New-AvailabilityGroupVM Child Runbook
UserTags: Utility, Windows Azure Virtual Machines, Azure Automation
